title: Happily Maybe After
description: It's been a year since Bran 'saved' his princely person. In the months since, Bran, Finn, and their fairy godmother Pax travelled halfway across the twelve kingdoms, defeated evil, solved crimes, accomplished the impossible (or so the tales say) – and fell in love. But the final leg of the journey has a few challenges waiting for them yet – including the most terrible of foes: relatives.Will Pax finally have enough booze? Has Bran become the hero he had always dreamt of becoming? And will he and Finn finally have their happy ending?
author: Iris Retzlaff
